name: LilyPad
detail: Lilypad is an app where parents can add, edit, and share child information with babysitters, caregivers, or family members.  Users may also search child friendly activities and upload photos to a gallery.

name: Stock
detail: Instock is a stock price application that makes it easy for the user to see opening and closing prices for the day.

name: Burger App
detail: Burger app is a simple burger name creator.  A burger name can be created, updated, and deleted.

name: Jinji
detail: Jinji is an application designed for Human Resource professionals and other leaders in management positions who want to foster a more social, inclusive environment for their employees.
